body: It looks like the Graphviz guys migrated their repo to a brand new platform that broke all the previously working download URLs. They are now providing source packages for version `2.40.1` only. After lurking around the web, I've found the missing package (`graphviz-2.38.0.tar.gz`) on the Fedora package repo. The file hash is the same.
title: Fix no longer existing download url in graphviz
